00021 sub reduce {
00022   my $self = shift;
00023   my %flags;
00024   foreach my $id (@_) {$flags{$id} = 1}
00025   $self->set(%flags);
00026 }
00027 
00028 sub noreduce {
00029   my $self = shift;
00030   my %flags;
00031   foreach my $id (@_) {$flags{$id} = 0}
00032   $self->set(%flags);
00033 }
